meanings.definition: Capable of being transported by truck.
meanings.sent1: The small car was not truckable due to its size.
meanings.sent2: The heavy machinery was easily truckable to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten thought it was truckable like the big dogs.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were as truckable as feathers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The fragile glassware was definitely not truckable during the move.

meanings.sent1: The sturdy crates were truckable for the long journey.
meanings.sent2: The flexible packaging made the items highly truckable.
meanings.sent3: The colorful balloons were surprisingly truckable for the party.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as truckable as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The fresh produce was perfectly truckable for delivery to the market.
